channel.title: Need noob help
channel.description:
Alright guys.. I am brand new to this. I used to fittle with private server sources, and I've always been interested. 4 years later, I'm ready to start learning. I downloaded a blank source, and I can't run it lol. This is what I got..
[Attempting to run Utopia at Wed 10/10/2012,22:05:50.13] Initializing utopia...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/utopia/rs 2/buildserver/ServerEngine : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: org.utopia.rs2.buildserver.ServerEngine. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Once I get it running I can start reading other things to get my learning going.

item.title: Need noob help
item.dc:creator: @Crimson_Bow Crimson Bow
item.description:
@Crimson_Bow wrote:

Added, I will really appreciate this.

Read full topic

item.title: Need noob help
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

[quote=“Crimson Bow, post:5, topic:463755”]I know man, that’s why I’m going to learn AS I code this blank source. With the help of a couple friends. The server to me right now is like… The test after the homework. Can you please help me get it running? lol.

But yeah, that is A LOT of learning. How do you suppose I go about it? Learning it all.[/quote]One step at a time man all there is to it.
I can work with you if you got skype. IF you do add me.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Crimson_Bow Crimson Bow

@Crimson_Bow wrote:

I know man, that’s why I’m going to learn AS I code this blank source. With the help of a couple friends. The server to me right now is like… The test after the homework. Can you please help me get it running? lol.

But yeah, that is A LOT of learning. How do you suppose I go about it? Learning it all.

item.title: Need noob help
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

Want to learn Java? CLICK ME.

Coding RSPSs will get you nowhere until you know all this.

Read full topic

item.title: Need noob help
item.dc:creator: @Crimson_Bow Crimson Bow
item.description:
@Crimson_Bow wrote:

How exactly do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Need noob help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You’re trying to run a server that was compiled with Java 6, with Java 7. You must recompile the source code your self to run the server.

Read full topic
